title: Hypergamouse 007
author: VD
content_html: I’ve always found it rather remarkable that so many women equate “working in an office” with “doing something important”, especially when the alternative is furthering the survival of the human race.
content_text:

working in an office
” with “doing something important”, especially when the alternative is furthering the survival of the human race.
